Make sure you order the paella and the seafood mixed plate, great value!  We were searching for good paella in Barcelona and found this restaurant on Yelp.  We weren't disappointed, it was exactly what we expected.  We ordered a lot of seafood, prawns, clams. I'm a seafood lover.  The seafood mixed plate and the paella are must and that's more than enough for two people.  There are patio seating available as well, the restaurant itself isn't very big but comfortable enough.  Service was great.  Sangria was really good, almost everyone there ordered their sangria.There are many selections in the menu, unfortunately we didn't get to try all, but if you're with a group, there is something for everyone.
